column8: 巨大的爆炸声中，火光冲天，灼热的空气将你狠狠掀翻在地。
column9: In a massive explosion, flames shoot skyward, and the scorching air throws you violently to the ground.

column8: ——意识再次断线前，最后映入眼中的，是掠过满月夜空的海鸟。
column9: —The last thing you saw before losing consciousness again was a seabird flying across the night sky, bathed in the light of the full moon.
